list.question: What is your base rate?
list.answer: Our base rate is $299/hour with a 2 hour minimum.

list.question: How many people does your boat fit?
Can I bring my own food/drinks?
list.answer: Yes, you are welcome to bring food and drinks! We provide a cooler with ice.

list.question: Can I rent the boat for a business party?
Is there a restroom on the boat?
How do I make a booking?
list.answer: Call/email/text us for charter reservations. A 50% deposit is required at the time of booking.
